movies.Plot: A tale of two strangers who transform each other's lives, a psychological thriller, and a story of love pitted against evil.

movies.title: Quarantine Tales
movies.Plot: Quarantine Tales is a collection of stories by 5 directors who tell the stories of life experienced during the pandemic.

movies.title: Fan Girl
movies.Plot: Avid Paulo Avelino fan Jane meets her onscreen idol in less-than-ideal circumstances after stowing away in the back of his pickup truck, and the young stan finds out that he isn't quite the perfect man when nobody's watching.

movies.title: Night Raiders
movies.Plot: A mother joins an underground band of vigilantes to try to rescue her daughter from a state-run institution.

movies.title: The Lost Daughter
movies.Plot: A woman's beach vacation takes a dark turn when she begins to confront the troubles of her past.

movies.title: I’m Your Man
movies.Plot: In order to obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to participate in an extraordinary experiment: for three weeks, she is to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy.

movies.title: Red Rocket
movies.Plot: Washed-up porn star Mikey Saber returns to his small Texas hometown and decides if he wants to be with his ex-wife or the donut shop girl hes in love with.

movies.title: Small Engine Repair
movies.Plot: Three lifelong friends get involved in a revenge plot for an incident that occurred with one of their daughters.

movies.title: Spencer
movies.Plot: Diana Spencer, struggling with mental-health problems during her Christmas holidays with the Royal Family at their Sandringham estate in Norfolk, England, decides to end her decade-long marriage to Prince Charles.

movies.title: Noise
movies.Plot: A mother desperately searching for daughter who's been missing for two years.

movies.title: The Girl Who Got Away
movies.Plot: A female serial killer escapes from prison to go after the one victim that got away.

movies.title: Sundown
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Weathering
movies.Plot: After losing her baby and nearly her life during labor, a journalist unravels amid disturbing visions and chilling attacks as she grieves alone at home.

movies.title: Dear Friend
movies.Plot: Four close friends who live together in Bangalore. The friendship filled with fun and humor which quickly changes into a gripping mystery that keeps the spectators on the edge of their seats and leaves them with mixed feelings.

movies.title: Trees of Peace
movies.Plot: In April of 1994, four women from different backgrounds and beliefs are trapped and hiding during the Genocide Against the Tutsi in Rwanda. Their fight for survival against all odds unites the women in an unbreakable sisterhood.

movies.title: Watcher
movies.Plot: A young American woman moves with her husband to Bucharest, and begins to suspect that a stranger who watches her from an apartment window may be a serial killer.

movies.title: Hurricane Season
movies.Plot: When a group of teens finds a corpse floating in a canal, the brutal reality behind the perverse crime unravels a town's hidden secrets.

movies.title: The Kings of the World
movies.Plot: Follows five young men and about the marginalized, excluded humanity who seeks a place in the world.

movies.title: Habaddi
movies.Plot: When the news of his village's school Kabaddi team travelling to Mumbai breaks out, a 10-year-old boy with a speech defect sees the opportunity to meet the girl he adores. But how will he chant 'Kabaddi, Kabaddi' without stammering?

movies.title: All India Rank
movies.Plot: Set in the late 1990s, A 17-year old Vivek who is sent away from home to a prep school to prepare for the highly competitive IIT ("the MIT of India") entrance examination.

movies.title: Runs in the Family
movies.Plot: An Indian father takes his transgender son on a road trip across South Africa to rescue his son's long-lost mother from a rehab clinic in eSwatini.

movies.title: Bones & All
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: Attention Please
movies.Plot: An aspiring script writer narrating his plots over booze to his 4 flat-mates.

movies.title: Ghodwa
movies.Plot: Ahmed joins his father Habib, whose state of health is deteriorating. They find themselves in a chaotic situation for which neither is prepared.

movies.title: Starfish
movies.Plot: Beautiful journey through the depths of the underwater world as we witness a gripping tale of grief and healing unfold before our eyes.

movies.title: Christmas Bloody Christmas
movies.Plot: It's Christmas Eve and Tori just wants to get drunk and party, but when a robotic Santa Claus at a nearby toy store goes haywire and begins a rampant killing spree through her small town, she's forced into a battle for survival.

movies.title: Cactus Flower
movies.Plot: In a hot and politically challenged Cairo actress Aida and her neighbor, the aging diva Samiha, are thrown out on the streets. Together with the street smart Yassin, they try to find a place to live, forcing them to confront with ...

movies.title: Run Rabbit Run
movies.Plot: When her young daughter starts behaving strangely, a fertility doctor who believes firmly in life and death must challenge her own values and confront a ghost from her past.

movies.title: Old Dads
movies.Plot: Three best friends become fathers later in life and find themselves battling preschool principals, millennial CEOs, and anything created after 1987.

movies.title: Raven Song
movies.Plot: Nasser, an unexceptional washout, is diagnosed with a brain tumor when he meets an enigmatic and peculiar young woman. Infatuated by her and sick of being a failure, he must quickly figure out what he wants to do in life before he...

movies.title: Padmini
movies.Plot: A part-time poet and a full-time college teacher Rameshans life take a standstill when an extremely embarrassing situation makes him the target of all jokes.

movies.title: The Outrun
movies.Plot: After living life on the edge in London, Rona attempts to come to terms with her troubled past. Hoping to heal, she returns to the wild beauty of Scotland's Orkney Islands where she grew up.

movies.title: Strawman
movies.Plot: Budny, a secret service officer, secretly surveils Bishop Karol Wojtyla for 20 years. An unreciprocated bond forms between Budny and the unaware Wojtyla, leading to an obsessive, pathological relationship from Budny's perspective.

movies.title: How to Have Sex
movies.Plot: Three British teenage girls go on a rites-of-passage holiday - drinking, clubbing and hooking up, in what should be the best summer of their lives.

movies.title: Daydreamers
movies.Plot: Many Somali refugees dream of a better life in the US. In order to get there, they have to cheat American authorities in an unprecedented way. But isn't a life in freedom worth the biggest scam of all times?

movies.title: Frybread Face and Me
movies.Plot: Two adolescent Navajo cousins from different worlds bond during a summer herding sheep on their grandmother's ranch in Arizona while learning more about their family's past and themselves.

movies.title: Three of Us
movies.Plot: A young couple is torn between their place in the Israeli Haredi (Ultra - orthodox) community and their desire to give their autistic son the chance to win independence and be integrated into society.

movies.title: Adrishya Jalakangal
movies.Plot: A young man gets released from a mental asylum and heads back to the place where he used to live and gets back to his part-time job as a night watchman in a morgue but soon he starts experiencing some strange things.

movies.title: Bottoms
movies.Plot: Two unpopular queer high-school students start a fight club to have sex before graduation.

movies.title: His Three Daughters
movies.Plot: This tense, touching and funny portrait of family dynamics follows three estranged sisters as they converge in a New York apartment to care for their ailing father and try to mend their own broken relationship with one another.

movies.title: Your Lucky Day
movies.Plot: When a dispute over a winning lottery ticket turns into a deadly hostage situation, the witnesses must decide exactly how far they're willing to go and how much blood they're willing to spill for a cut of $156 million.

movies.title: Simón
movies.Plot: Simón, a Venezuelan freedom fighter exiled in Miami, copes not only with trauma, but also deep guilt over a choice he must make: stay in Miami and start a new life, or return home to the losing fight against a tyrannical regime.

movies.title: Steve
movies.Plot: Follows headteacher Steve battling for his reform college's survival while managing his mental health. Concurrently, troubled student Shy navigates his violent tendencies and fragility, torn between his past and future prospects.

movies.title: Close to You
movies.Plot: When he returns home for his father's birthday, a man finds that his family is struggling to accept his transition.

movies.title: Lola
movies.Plot: Lola James works to save enough money to get her little brother, Arlo, out of their toxic home. Arlo keeps her hopeful, until one tragic night, when her whole world gets uprooted. From that moment on, nothing will ever be the same.

movies.title: Downtown Owl
movies.Plot: Based on the novel by Chuck Klosterman, Downtown Owl is a sparkle dark Reagan Era comedy set in the fictional town of Owl, North Dakota in the leading days up to the region's blizzard in Minnesota's century.

movies.title: Bittersweet Rain
movies.Plot: How Bruno, a 15-year-old, growing up in a humble neighbourhood, overcomes the reality of becoming blind.

movies.title: I Used to Be Funny
movies.Plot: Sam, a stand-up comedian struggling with PTSD, weighs whether or not to join the search for a missing teenage girl she used to nanny.

movies.title: The Room Next Door
movies.Plot: Ingrid and Martha were close friends in their youth, when they worked together at the same magazine. After years of being out of touch, they meet again in an extreme but strangely sweet situation.

movies.title: We Grown Now
movies.Plot: Two young boys, best friends Malik and Eric, discover the joys and hardships of growing up in the sprawling Cabrini-Green public housing complex in 1992 Chicago.

movies.title: Ro & the Stardust
movies.Plot: A free-spirited teen fulfills her terminally ill grandmother's dying wish of building a rocket ship to launch her into outer space.

movies.title: Daddio
movies.Plot: A woman taking a cab ride from JFK engages in a conversation with the taxi driver about the important relationships in their lives.

movies.title: Kneecap
movies.Plot: When fate brings Belfast teacher JJ into the orbit of self-confessed "low life scum" Naoise and Liam Óg, the needle drops on a hip hop act like no other. Rapping in their native Irish, they lead a movement to save their mother ton...

movies.title: Cora Bora
movies.Plot: Follows Cora, who feels that her relationship is not going well. She goes back home to win her girlfriend back but she will realize that it's much more than her love life that needs salvaging.

movies.title: Between the Temples
movies.Plot: A cantor in a crisis of faith finds his world turned upside down when his grade school music teacher re-enters his life as his new adult Bat Mitzvah student.

movies.title: The Amazing Journey of the Letters
Anuja
movies.Plot: When a gifted 9-year-old girl, who works in a garment factory, is offered a once-in-a-lifetime chance to attend school, she is forced to make a heart-wrenching decision that will determine her and her sister's fate.

movies.title: Train Dreams
movies.Plot: Based on Denis Johnson's beloved novella, Train Dreams is the moving portrait of Robert Grainier, a logger and railroad worker who leads a life of unexpected depth and beauty in the rapidly-changing America of the early 20th Century.

movies.title: I'm Still Here
movies.Plot: A woman married to a former politician during the military dictatorship in Brazil is forced to reinvent herself and chart a new course for her family after a violent and arbitrary act.

movies.title: The Best Mother in the World
NOUVELLE VAGUE
movies.Plot: After writing for Cahiers du cinéma, young Godard decides making films is the best film criticism. He gets Beauregard to fund a low-budget feature, creating a treatment with Truffaut about a gangster couple.

movies.title: On Swift Horses
movies.Plot: Muriel and her husband Lee are about to begin a bright new life, which is upended by the arrival of Lee's brother. Muriel embarks on a secret life, gambling on racehorses and discovering a love she never thought possible.

movies.title: Oh, Hi!
movies.Plot: Iris and Isaac's first romantic weekend getaway goes awry in a most unexpected way.

movies.title: Bad Shabbos
movies.Plot: An engaged interfaith couple are about to have their parents meet for the first time over a Shabbat dinner when an accidental death gets in the way.

movies.title: North Hollywood
movies.Plot: A kid must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skater.

movies.title: Deadstream
movies.Plot: A disgraced internet personality attempts to win back his followers by livestreaming one night alone in a haunted house. But when he accidentally upsets a vengeful spirit, his big comeback event becomes a real-time fight for his l...

movies.title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry
movies.Plot: Harold is an ordinary man who has passed through life, living on the side lines, until he goes to post a letter one day...and just keeps walking.

movies.title: Sew Torn
movies.Plot: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a briefcase from a drug deal gone bad. In an escalating game of cat and mouse, her different choices lead to drastically different outcomes along the way.

movies.title: Humans in the loop
movies.Plot: Nehma, an Adivasi woman from the Oraon tribe, returns to her ancestral village with her children, Dhaanu (12) and Guntu (1), after her divorce. She begins work as a 'data labeller,' training AI models to recognise objects in image...

movies.title: Lies We Tell
movies.Plot: An orphaned heiress is forced to embrace her family's dark legacy.

movies.title: The Best You Can
movies.Plot: Stan Olszewski, a security guard foils a home robbery attempt at Cynthia Rand's residence. A charged friendship develops starting with late-night humorous texts. Their deepening bond shakes up both their lives.

movies.title: Ullozhukku
movies.Plot: A family's attempt to bury a loved one is thwarted by floodwaters, forcing them to confront long-buried secrets and lies that threaten their unity.

movies.title: Paradise
movies.Plot: After his wife is forced to give up 40 years of her life as payment for an insurance debt, a man desperately searches for a way to get them back.

movies.title: Left-Handed Girl
movies.Plot: A single mother and her two daughters relocate to Taipei to open a night market stall, each navigating the challenges of adapting to their new environment while striving to maintain family unity.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.Plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
